message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet high standards. I believe it will be a valuable asset for you. I am offering it for $100, reflecting its quality and the benefits it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm looking to save some money, but I still want to get a good deal. Can you meet me in the middle at $90?
